reports.summary: The tab changes from this user have major timing and sync mistakes, and is a big downgrade from before

title: Eruption

description:
Reworked BPM Track, added Sections Names, figured out Time Signatures that make more sense and are easier to read, BPM changes follow the song, Outro leads to You Really Got Me more accurately
Added Chord and Note Names to Guitar and Bass
Added another Guitar Track to simulate Whammy Bar and Slides
Edited and Added Notes, Bends, Slides, Palm Mutes and some Pinch Harmonics. Simplified Note Durations thanks to the new BPM track
Some Palm Mutes and the Big Chords Slide Bend are just for effects*
Added a missing Bass Chord
Changed some Drum Notes
After Eddie passed away I wanted to remember him by working on some tabs and decided to make some improvement to one of the best guitar solos.
title: Eruption
